H1.text: who 's winning the election in virginia for governor. Tom Perriello

H2.text: who 's winning the election in virginia for governor. Terry McAuliffe

H3.text: who 's winning the election in virginia for governor. Ralph Northam

A4.text: Northam was elected 73rd Governor of Virginia on November 7, 2017, defeating Ed Gillespie in the general election with a larger-than-expected nine-point margin of victory.

A5.text: On June 13, 2017, Northam won the Democratic nomination with 56% of the vote to Perriello's 44%.
